issues.title: Historical lookback period not specified
issues.description: 'historical prices' used in z-score but lookback period not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'mean_price and std_dev calculated using 60 trading days of daily closing prices'

issues.title: Entry threshold not specified
issues.description: 'drops below threshold' but threshold value not defined

issues.title: Exit threshold not specified
issues.description: 'exceeds upper threshold' but value not defined

issues.title: Position sizing formula not provided
issues.description: 'Position size based on signal strength' but no formula given
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Position size = Base_Size × min(|z-score| / 2, 1.5)' or other explicit formula

issues.title: Maximum position size not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Maximum 5% of portfolio value per position'

issues.title: Stop loss level not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Stop loss at 3% loss from entry price'

issues.title: Price type not specified in formula
issues.description: Formula uses 'current_price' but doesn't specify if using close, VWAP, mid-price, etc.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'current_price = daily closing price at 16:00 ET'

issues.title: Mean calculation method not specified
issues.description: Could be arithmetic mean, geometric mean, or other
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'mean_price = arithmetic mean of daily closing prices over lookback period'
